javadoc.text:
* Adapter that permits an {@link cern.colt.list.AbstractFloatList} to be viewed and treated as a JDK 1.2 {@link java.util.AbstractList}. * Makes the contained list compatible with the JDK 1.2 Collections Framework. *
* Any attempt to pass elements other than java.lang.Number to setter methods will throw a java.lang.ClassCastException. * java.lang.Number.floatValue() is used to convert objects into primitive values which are then stored in the backing templated list. * Getter methods return java.lang.Float objects.
* Constructs a list backed by the specified content list.

* Inserts the specified element at the specified position in this list * (optional operation). Shifts the element currently at that position * (if any) and any subsequent elements to the right (adds one to their * indices).
javadoc.param: index index at which the specified element is to be inserted.
javadoc.throws: ClassCastException if the class of the specified element * prevents it from being added to this list.
IllegalArgumentException if some aspect of the specified * element prevents it from being added to this list.
IndexOutOfBoundsException index is out of range (index < * 0 || index > size()).

javadoc.text: * Returns the element at the specified position in this list.
javadoc.param: index index of element to return.
javadoc.return: the element at the specified position in this list.
javadoc.throws: IndexOutOfBoundsException if the given index is out of range * (index < 0 || index >= size()).

javadoc.text: * Transforms an element of a primitive data type to an object.

* Removes the element at the specified position in this list (optional * operation). Shifts any subsequent elements to the left (subtracts one * from their indices). Returns the element that was removed from the * list.
javadoc.param: index the index of the element to remove.
javadoc.return: the element previously at the specified position.
javadoc.throws: IndexOutOfBoundsException if the specified index is out of * range (index < 0 || index >= size()).

javadoc.text: * Replaces the element at the specified position in this list with the * specified element (optional operation).
javadoc.param: index index of element to replace.
element element to be stored at the specified position.
javadoc.return: the element previously at the specified position.
javadoc.throws: ClassCastException if the class of the specified element * prevents it from being added to this list.
IllegalArgumentException if some aspect of the specified * element prevents it from being added to this list.
IndexOutOfBoundsException if the specified index is out of * range (index < 0 || index >= size()).

javadoc.text: * Returns the number of elements in this list.
javadoc.return: the number of elements in this list.

javadoc.text: * Transforms an object element to a primitive data type.
